content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help.

Keeping the cash back rewards separate is a great idea, as it will give you a clear picture of your total spending and the rewards you've earned. It's always exciting to see the cash back rewards add up, and it can be a great motivator to continue earning more.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, happy shopping and happy tracking!

Remember to regularly review your budget and adjust as needed. You got this!

(And don't forget to redeem those cash back rewards when the time comes!)
